Posts.Content: Hi, I’ve just been diagnosed with lobular breast cancer. I am waiting for surgery. I am exhausted most of the time! Wondered is this just me or is it the cancer?Â
Posts.Title: Tiredness and aches.....

Posts.Content: Hi im three weeks into post lumpectomy. I’m in lots of pain (wasn’t initially) with my breast. Really bad. Surgeon says it’s nerve pain. How long does this last ? Making me sweat. It’s awful.
Posts.Title: Post lumpectomy pain

Posts.Content: Hi, six weeks ago I was diagnosed with breast cancer. I’ve had a lumpectomy and SLB and now they say I have to have all my nodes removed as the cancer has spread and I’ve more satellite growth around my breast. I’m terrified this second time. Very low and weepy. I’m still in pain under my arm and understand the full removal of lymph nodes is very painful. I’m scared and worried. Not sleeping, so much going around my head. Is there anything I can do before I have another procedure to prepare for this?
Posts.Title: another lumpectomy
